titles.title: Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Doctor Muhammad Yunus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 3/6/2013--Introduced. Authorizes the use of the Capitol rotunda on April 17, 2013, for a ceremony to award the congressional gold medal to Doctor Muhammad Yunus in recognition of his contributions to the fight against global poverty.
